byline.original: By JOHN HERRMAN and SAPNA MAHESHWARI

abstract: Facebook apologizes for error that for years greatly overstated amount of time users spent watching videos on website; 'discrepancy' is problematic for partners, advertisers and publishers.
lead_paragraph: The social media network was leaving out videos viewed for less than three seconds, which greatly inflated the figures presented to advertisers and publishers.
snippet: The social media network was leaving out videos viewed for less than three seconds, which greatly inflated the figures presented to advertisers and publishers....

headline.main: Facebook Apologizes for Overstating Video Metrics
